mapper.sql: sku, marketplace_name, posted_date, transaction_type, amount_type, amount_description, currency, amount, quantity_purchased
mapper.select: SELECT ifnull(n.transaction_type,'sku') transaction_type, ifnull(n.amount_type,'sku') amount_type, ifnull(n.amount_description,'sku') amount_description, max(m.currency) currency, MAX(m.settlementid) settlementid, MAX(m.amazonAuthId) amazonAuthId, sum(case when a.region='EU' then case when m.transaction_type='Order' and m.amount_type='ItemPrice' and ( m.amount_description='Principal' or m.amount_description='Tax') then m.amount else 0 end else case when m.transaction_type='Order' and m.amount_description='Principal' then m.amount else 0 end end) in_principal , SUM(case when m.transaction_type='Order' and m.amount_description='Principal' then m.amount else 0 end ) principal , sum(case when m.amount_description='Principal' and m.transaction_type='Order' and m.amount_type='ItemPrice' then m.quantity_orders else 0 end) order_amount, sum(case when m.amount_description='Principal' and m.transaction_type='Order' and m.amount_type='ItemPrice' then m.quantity_purchased else 0 end) sales, SUM(m.amount) amount from t_amz_settlement_summary_month m LEFT JOIN t_amazon_auth a ON a.id=m.amazonAuthId LEFT JOIN t_amz_settlement_amount_type_nonsku n ON n.transaction_type=m.transaction_type AND n.amount_type=m.amount_type AND n.amount_description=case when n.amount_description='*' then '*' ELSE m.amount_description END WHERE m.settlementid=#{settlementid,jdbcType=CHAR} GROUP BY n.transaction_type,n.amount_type,n.amount_description
mapper.delete:
delete from t_amz_settlement_summary_day where settlementid=#{settlement_id,jdbcType=CHAR};
insert into t_amz_settlement_summary_day select UUID_SHORT(), r.settlement_id, r.amazonAuthId, IFNULL(r.sku,'*'), rt.marketplace_name, r.posted_date, transaction_type, amount_type, amount_description, fulfillment_id, r.currency,sum(amount), sum(case when r.transaction_type='Refund' AND r.amount_type='ItemPrice' AND r.amount_description='Principal' then IFNULL((SELECT sum(quantity) from t_amz_returns_report rr where rr.order_id=r.order_id AND rr.sku=r.sku AND rr.sellerid=a.sellerid),1) ELSE r.quantity_purchased END) quantity_purchased, COUNT(DISTINCT r.order_id) from t_amz_settlement_report r left JOIN t_amz_settlement_acc_report rt ON rt.settlement_id=r.settlement_id LEFT JOIN t_amazon_auth a ON a.id=r.amazonAuthId where r.settlement_id=#{settlement_id,jdbcType=CHAR} group BY r.amazonAuthId,r.sku,rt.marketplace_name,r.posted_date, transaction_type,amount_type,amount_description,fulfillment_id,r.currency
